ARABIC: أَوْ تُسْقِطَ ٱلسَّمَآءَ كَمَا زَعَمْتَ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا أَوْ تَأْتِىَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلْمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ قَبِيلًا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: or make the sky, as you claim, fall down on us in lumps; or bring Allah and the angels here as a guarantee;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Or, let chunks of sky fall over us, as you assert (you will); or, bring God and the angels as a surety;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: or cause the sky to fall on us in pieces as you claimed, or bring Allah and the angels before us, face to face;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: or cause the sky to fall into pieces on us - as you believe you can - or bring God and the angels face to face with us,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Or you cause the sky to fall upon us in pieces like you said – or bring Allah and the angels as Witness.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Or you cause the heaven to fall upon us in pieces, as you have pretended, or you bring Allah and the angels before (us) face to face;"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Or you should cause the heaven to come down upon us in pieces as you think, or bring Allah and the angels face to face (with us).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: or till thou makest heaven to fall, as thou assertest, on us in fragments, or thou bringest God and the angels as a surety,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Or thou cause the heaven to fall upon us piecemeal, as thou hast pretended, or bring Allah and the angels as a warrant;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: or you cause the heavens to fall down on us in pieces, as you have claimed; or you bring God and the angels before us face to face;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Or thou causest the heaven to fall upon us, as thou assertest, in pieces, or thou bringest God and the angels face to face.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Or until you cause the sky to fall in fragments upon us, just as you have averred. Or until you bring Allah and the angels [right] in front of us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Or thou cause the sky to fall in pieces, as thou sayest (will happen), against us; or thou bring Allah and the angels before (us) face to face:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Or you cause the heaven to fall upon us in pieces, as you have pretended, or you bring Allah and the angels before (us) face to face;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: or, until you cause the sky to fall upon us in pieces, as you have claimed, or, as a surety bring Allah with the angels in front;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Or make the sky fall on us in pieces, as you claim, or bring God and the angels before us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Or you make the heaven fall upon us in fragments as you have claimed or you bring Allah and the angels before [us]
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [17:92] or until you cause the heaven to fall upon us, as you assert, in pieces, or bring God and the angels [right] in front [of us], face to face [with us], before [our] very eyes, so that we might see them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Or thou cause the heaven to fall upon us piecemeal) as a punishment, (as thou hast pretended, or bring Allah and the angels as a warrant) as witnesses for what you say;
